summary:
The Black Mamba, the sword who actually isn't black.
Based on the Sanke with the same name who also ain't look like that.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53894-1-1399970116.jpg[/img]
[/center]

[b]Finally after 3 days end of the weapon, It's actually completely rebuild but keeping the concept.[/b]

[size=5][b]Changes:
-New Model
-New Texture
-Improved Maps
-Fix the problem on first person, the hilt was to big on that view. (Still that big, just the weapon is barely smaller than 3Â° person)


The weapon still the same, download the file and replace the previous files, with or without manager you don't need uninstall the previous.
This is a different weapon that's why I keep the previous one as optional file instead of an old version, but you only can use one.


Hope you guys enjoy the weapon and waiting for a feedback :P



Till next time[/b][/size]


[color=#ff9933][i]To do List:
(*): A mod.
(*): Update textures[/i][/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=3][color=#ff9933][i][b][size=3][i](*)[/i][/size][/b][/i]: Update [/color][i][color=#ff9933]maps (hand made)
(+): Keep learning and still, i learned a lot on just 3 days and keep learning[/color]



[i]Previous article:[/i]
[quote][b][size=3][url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_mamba][img]http://i.imgur.com/sieaSjl.jpg[/img][/url]
[/size][/b][i][size=3](Click the image for [b]wikipedia[/b] info)[/size][/i][b][size=3]
[i]
This is me first ever "attempt" to modding, its a weapon based on basic tutorial.
I try to imitate a snake or something like that...


The intention was to put practice the tutorials.


Weapon Spec:

Damage : 21
Weight: 10
Craftable: Ebony
Materials:Ingot Ebony x3 / Leather Strips x2




I know the model its not perfect and also the texture and map are wrong...
But i going to keep learning off course also improve this weapon and maybe create some more mods.[/i]
[color=#3366ff]
The weapon contain a CUSTOM draw SOUNDS, download it and enjoy 99% going to find it familiar.[/color]

[color=#ff9933][i]To do List:

[/i][/size][/b]

[center][b][size=3][i]That's all hope you like the mod i promise to improve it soon.[/i][/size][/b]
